name: Proper Sitting Etiquette
outcome: [AttackerName] disappears in the blink of an eye and [TargetName] whirls around to try and find where [AttackerName] has disappeared to, but turns around directly into [TargetHisOrHer] assailant soaring through the air with spread legs. |n|[AttackerName]'s weight carries [TargetName] to the ground and pins [TargetHimOrHer] to a prepared mattress.
miss: [AttackerName] disappears from sight and as [TargetName] tries to locate her, narrowly dodges the charging maid's assault.
